name: Nova Launcher Home Screen Backup
summary: A NOVABACKUP file is a home screen layout created using Nova Launcher, a home screen replacement app for Android. It contains data Nova Launcher uses to load and display a custom Android home screen. Users create NOVABACKUP files from within Nova Launcher, by selecting the app's menu button and then Nova Settings → Backup and Import → Backup .
